archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1427
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Product Owner I need configurable customer user access roles & hierarchies to be available so that we can restrict/control user activities across account, products and service portals

properties.value: Quite generic requirement related to users and customer structure. To be defined in more details what is the level of configurability and what use cases should be supported. Please specify list of business specific roles (other than end user, owner, admin). @Jared to provide list of business roles

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
